trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> object to and from a string that represents the type name.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 对象与代表类型名称的字符串相互转换。

trans-unit.source: This functionality is used for XAML extensibility by markup definitions, via <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.PropertyDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: 此功能由标记定义通过 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.PropertyDefinition" /> 用于 XAML 扩展性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 一种格式上下文，可提供有关要从中调用此转换器的环境的信息。

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要进行计算以供转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可使用指定上下文，将指定类型的对象转换为 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此转换器能够执行该操作，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> to and from a <xref:System.String> (or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter>类仅将转换的实例<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>来回<xref:System.String>(或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>)。

trans-unit.source: Other `sourceType` inputs return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 其他`sourceType`输入返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 一种格式上下文，可提供有关要从中调用此转换器的环境的信息。

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要进行计算以供转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可使用指定的上下文将 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 的实例转换为指定类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此转换器能够执行该操作，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> to and from a <xref:System.String> (or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter>类仅将转换的实例<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>来回<xref:System.String>(或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>)。

trans-unit.source: Other `destinationType` inputs return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 其他`destinationType`输入返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 一种格式上下文，可提供有关要从中调用此转换器的环境的信息。

trans-unit.source: Culture specific information.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的信息。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用指定上下文将指定对象转换为 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 被转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> to and from a <xref:System.String> (or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter>类仅将转换的实例<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>来回<xref:System.String>(或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>)。

trans-unit.source: Other `value` types throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 其他`value`类型均将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be converted.
trans-unit.target: 无法转换 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 一种格式上下文，可提供有关要从中调用此转换器的环境的信息。

trans-unit.source: Culture specific information.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的信息。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: 对象要转换为的类型。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用指定上下文将 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 转换为指定类型。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 被转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> to and from a <xref:System.String> (or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter>类仅将转换的实例<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>来回<xref:System.String>(或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>)。

trans-unit.source: Other `value` types or `destinationType` inputs throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 其他`value`类型或`destinationType`输入引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be converted.
trans-unit.target: 无法转换 <paramref name="value" />。
